credit_line: Bequest of Mrs. John Innes Kane
title: Candleholder
description: a) Three branched candelabrum in form of an oak tree. Base, outlined by three reverse curves; column represents a tree trunk (from which the lower branches have been cut) with leaves at the top and four twisting branches; three of the branches have acorns serving as sockets for candles. b) The section above the leaves is removable.
name: Candleholder
